unnormalised: I remember feeling so lost after my MA exams at JNU. A friend, Priya, suggested a mental health app. Honestly, I was skeptical. It felt… impersonal. Like a Band-Aid on a broken arm, you know? But after watching "Dear Zindagi", I thought, "Kyun nahi?" Maybe it's worth a shot. Starting small. Baby steps.
